00092 void SceneModel::SetCoinScene( TSceneKit& coinScene )
00093 {
00094         if( m_instanceRoot )    Clear();
00095         m_mapCoinQt.clear();
00096         m_coinScene = 0;
00097     m_coinScene = &coinScene;
00098 
00099     SetRoot();
00100     SetLight();
00101     SetConcentrator();
00102     reset();
00103 }

00110 void SceneModel::Clear()
00111 {
00112         DeleteInstanceTree( *m_instanceRoot );
00113 
00114         delete m_instanceRoot;
00115         m_instanceRoot = 0;
00116 
00117 }

00124 void SceneModel::SetRoot()
00125 {
00126     m_instanceRoot = new InstanceNode( m_coinScene );
00127     QList< InstanceNode* > instanceRootNodeList;
00128     m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( m_coinScene, instanceRootNodeList ) );
00129     m_mapCoinQt[m_coinScene].append( m_instanceRoot );
00130 }

00132 void SceneModel::SetLight()
00133 {
00134     if ( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) )
00135     {
00136         TLightKit* tlightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList[0]", false ) );
00137         InsertLightNode( *tlightKit );
00138     }
00139 }

00141 void SceneModel::SetConcentrator()
00142 {
00143         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00144 
00145         //TSeparatorKit* separatorKit;
00146         if ( coinPartList && coinPartList->getNumChildren() == 0 )
00147         {
00148                 //Create Sun coordinate system node
00149                 TSeparatorKit* sunSeparatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00150                 sunSeparatorKit->setName( "SunNode" );
00151                 coinPartList->addChild( sunSeparatorKit );
00152                 sunSeparatorKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00153                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = AddInstanceNode( *m_instanceRoot, sunSeparatorKit );
00154                 SoNodeKitListPart* sunSeparatorChildList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00155 
00156                 TSceneTracker* sceneTracker = new TSceneTracker;
00157                 sunSeparatorKit->setPart( "tracker", sceneTracker );
00158                 sceneTracker->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00159 
00160 
00161                 //Create Concentrator coordinate system node
00162                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = new TSeparatorKit();
00163                 separatorKit->setName( "RootNode" );
00164                 sunSeparatorChildList->addChild( separatorKit );
00165                 separatorKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00166 
00167                 AddInstanceNode( *instanceNode, separatorKit );
00168         }
00169         else
00170         {
00171                 TSeparatorKit* sunSeparatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( 0 ) );
00172                 if ( !sunSeparatorKit ) return;
00173 
00174                 InstanceNode* sunInstanceNode = AddInstanceNode( *m_instanceRoot, sunSeparatorKit );
00175                 SoNodeKitListPart* sunSeparatorChildList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00176                 if ( !sunSeparatorChildList ) return;
00177 
00178                 SoNode* tracker = sunSeparatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false );
00179                 if( tracker )
00180                 {
00181                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00182                         trackerNode->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00183                         //AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, tracker );
00184                 }
00185 
00186 
00187                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( sunSeparatorChildList->getChild( 0 ) );
00188                 if( !separatorKit )     return;
00189 
00190                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = AddInstanceNode( *sunInstanceNode, separatorKit );
00191                 GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00192         }
00193 }

00195 InstanceNode* SceneModel::AddInstanceNode( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* soNode )
00196 {
00197         InstanceNode* instanceNode = new InstanceNode( soNode );
00198         if( instanceNode )
00199         {
00200                 instanceNodeParent.AddChild( instanceNode );
00201                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00202                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( soNode, instanceNodeList ) );
00203                 m_mapCoinQt[soNode].append( instanceNode );
00204         }
00205         return instanceNode;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void SceneModel::GenerateInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent )
00209 {
00210         SoNode* parentNode = instanceNodeParent.GetNode();
00211 
00212         if( parentNode )
00213         {
00214                 if( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00215                 {
00216                         if( parentNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00217                         {
00218                                 GenerateTShapeKitSubTree( instanceNodeParent, parentNode  );
00219                         }
00220                         else
00221                         {
00222                                 GenerateTSeparatorKitSubTree( instanceNodeParent, parentNode  );
00223                         }
00224                 }
00225         }
00226 }
00227 
00228 void SceneModel::GenerateTShapeKitSubTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* parentNode )
00229 {
00230         TShapeKit* parentKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( parentNode );
00231         if( parentKit )
00232         {
00233                 SoNode* shape = parentKit->getPart("shape", false);
00234                 if( shape )     AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, shape );
00235                 SoNode* material = parentKit->getPart("appearance.material", false);
00236                 if( material ) AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, material );
00237         }
00238 }
00239 
00240 void SceneModel::GenerateTSeparatorKitSubTree( InstanceNode& instanceNodeParent, SoNode* parentNode )
00241 {
00242         //Is TSeparatorKit node
00243         SoBaseKit* parentKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( parentNode );
00244         if( parentKit )
00245         {
00246                 SoNode* tracker = parentKit->getPart( "tracker", false );
00247                 if( tracker )
00248                 {
00249                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00250                         trackerNode->SetSceneKit( m_coinScene );
00251                         AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, tracker );
00252                 }
00253 
00254                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( parentKit->getPart( "childList", false ) );
00255                 if ( coinPartList )
00256                 {
00257                         for( int index = 0; index < coinPartList->getNumChildren(); ++index )
00258                         {
00259                                 SoBaseKit* coinChild = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( index ) );
00260                                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = AddInstanceNode( instanceNodeParent, coinChild );
00261                                 if( instanceChild) GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00262                         }
00263                 }
00264         }
00265 }

00267 QModelIndex SceneModel::index( int row, int column, const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00268 {
00269         if ( !m_instanceRoot ) return QModelIndex();
00270         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00271     return createIndex( row, column, instanceParent->children[ row ] );
00272 }

00274 InstanceNode* SceneModel::NodeFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00275 {
00276         if ( modelIndex.isValid() ) return static_cast< InstanceNode* >( modelIndex.internalPointer() );
00277     else return m_instanceRoot;
00278 }

00280 int SceneModel::rowCount( const QModelIndex& parentModelIndex ) const
00281 {
00282         InstanceNode* instanceParent = NodeFromIndex( parentModelIndex );
00283     return ( instanceParent ) ? ( instanceParent->children.count() ) : 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 int SceneModel::columnCount( const QModelIndex& ) const
00287 {
00288         return 1;
00289 }
00290 
00291 QModelIndex SceneModel::parent( const QModelIndex& childModelIndex ) const
00292 {
00293         InstanceNode* instanceChild = NodeFromIndex( childModelIndex );
00294     if ( !instanceChild ) return QModelIndex();
00295 
00296     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceChild->GetParent();
00297     if ( !instanceParent ) return QModelIndex();
00298 
00299     InstanceNode* instanceGrandparent = instanceParent->GetParent();
00300     if ( !instanceGrandparent ) return QModelIndex();
00301 
00302     int row = instanceGrandparent->children.indexOf( instanceParent );
00303     return createIndex( row, childModelIndex.column(), instanceParent );
00304 }

00306 QVariant SceneModel::headerData( int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role ) const
00307 {
00308         if ( orientation == Qt::Horizontal && role == Qt::DisplayRole)
00309         {
00310                 if ( section == 0 ) return tr( "Node" );
00311     }
00312     return QVariant();

00314 
00315 QVariant SceneModel::data( const QModelIndex& modelIndex, int role ) const
00316 {
00317 
00318     if ( role != Qt::DisplayRole && role != Qt::UserRole && role != Qt::DecorationRole ) return QVariant();
00319 
00320     InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
00321     if ( !instanceNode ) return QVariant();
00322 
00323 
00324     if ( modelIndex.column() == 0 )
00325     {
00326         SoNode* coinNode = instanceNode->GetNode();
00327         if ( !coinNode ) return QVariant();
00328 
00329         if ( role == Qt::DisplayRole )
00330         {
00331             if ( coinNode )
00332             {
00333                 QString nodeName;
00334                 if ( coinNode->getName() == SbName() )
00335                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() );
00336                 else
00337                         nodeName = QString( coinNode->getName().getString() );
00338 
00339 
00340                                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00341                                 coinSearch->setNode( coinNode );
00342                                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00343                                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00344 
00345                                 int numReferences = coinSearch->getPaths( ).getLength();
00346 
00347                                 QString references ( " ( " );
00348                                 references += QString::number( numReferences, 10);
00349                                 references += " )  " ;
00350 
00351                                 delete coinSearch;
00352 
00353                 return references + nodeName;
00354             }
00355             else return QVariant();
00356         }
00357 
00358         if ( role == Qt::UserRole )
00359         {
00360                 SoNodeKitPath* coinKitPath = PathFromIndex(modelIndex);
00361                 if ( coinKitPath )
00362                 {
00363                         PathWrapper pathWrapper( coinKitPath );
00364                     return QVariant::fromValue( pathWrapper );
00365 
00366                 }
00367                 coinKitPath->unref();
00368                 return  QVariant();
00369         }
00370         if (role == Qt::DecorationRole)
00371         {
00372                         if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TLightKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00373                         {
00374                                 return QIcon(":/icons/lightKit.png");
00375                         }
00376                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00377                         {
00378                                 TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast<TSeparatorKit*>( coinNode );
00379                                 return QIcon( separatorKit->getIcon() );
00380 
00381                         }
00382                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00383                         {
00384                                 SoBaseKit* nodeKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNode );
00385                                 TShape* kit = static_cast<TShape*>( nodeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00386                                 if( kit ) return QIcon( kit->GetIcon() );
00387                                 return QIcon( ":/icons/shapeKit.png" );
00388                         }
00389                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00390                         {
00391                                 TShape* shape = static_cast<TShape*>( coinNode );
00392                                 return QIcon( shape->GetIcon() );
00393                         }
00394                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TMaterial::getClassTypeId() ) )
00395                         {
00396                                 TMaterial* material = static_cast<TMaterial*>( coinNode );
00397                                 return QIcon(material->getIcon());
00398                         }
00399                         else if( coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom(TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00400                         {
00401                                 TTracker* tracer = static_cast<TTracker*>( coinNode );
00402                                 return QIcon(tracer->getIcon());
00403                         }
00404         }
00405     }
00406     return QVariant();
00407 }
00408 
00409 int SceneModel::InsertCoinNode( SoNode& coinChild, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00410 {
00411         int row = -1;
00412         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00413         {
00414                 if( coinChild.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00415                 {
00416                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", &coinChild );
00417                         row = 0;
00418                 }
00419                 else
00420                 {
00421 
00422                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00423                         if ( !coinPartList ) return -1;
00424 
00425                         row = coinPartList->getNumChildren();
00426 
00427                         if( coinChild.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00428                         {
00429                                 SoBaseKit* childKit = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( &coinChild );
00430                                 coinPartList->addChild( childKit );
00431                                 childKit->setSearchingChildren( true );
00432 
00433                                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) ) row++;
00434                         }
00435                 }
00436 
00437         }
00438     else
00439     {
00440         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* > ( &coinParent );
00441         if( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) ) row++;
00442         if( shapeKit->getPart( "appearance.material", false ) ) row++;
00443     }
00444 
00445         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00446         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); index++ )
00447         {
00448             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00449                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( &coinChild );
00450                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00451 
00452                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00453                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00454                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( &coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00455         m_mapCoinQt[ &coinChild ].append( instanceChild );
00456 
00457         GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00458         }
00459         emit layoutChanged();
00460 
00461         return row;
00462 }
00463 
00464 
00469 void SceneModel::InsertLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00470 {
00471         SoNodeKitListPart* lightList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* > ( m_coinScene->getPart("lightList", true ) ) ;
00472         if ( lightList->getNumChildren() > 0 )
00473                 if( m_instanceRoot->children.size() > 0 ) m_instanceRoot->children.remove( 0 );
00474 
00475         m_coinScene->setPart( "lightList[0]", &coinLight );
00476 
00477         SoSearchAction* tracersSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00478         tracersSearch->setType( TTracker::getClassTypeId() );
00479         tracersSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00480         tracersSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00481         SoPathList& trackersPath = tracersSearch->getPaths();
00482 
00483         for( int index = 0; index <trackersPath.getLength(); ++index )
00484         {
00485                 SoFullPath* trackerPath = static_cast< SoFullPath* > ( trackersPath[index] );
00486                 TTracker* tracker = static_cast< TTracker* >( trackerPath->getTail() );
00487                 tracker->SetAzimuthAngle( &coinLight.azimuth );
00488                 tracker->SetZenithAngle( &coinLight.zenith );
00489         }
00490 
00491         InstanceNode* instanceLight = new InstanceNode( &coinLight );
00492         m_instanceRoot->InsertChild( 0, instanceLight );
00493 
00494 
00495         emit LightNodeStateChanged( 1 );
00496         emit layoutChanged();
00497 }
00498 
00499 
00500 void SceneModel::RemoveCoinNode( int row, SoBaseKit& coinParent )
00501 {
00502         if (coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00503         {
00504                 if( ( row == 0 ) && coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )
00505                 {
00506                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", NULL );
00507                 }
00508                 else
00509                 {
00510                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );
00511                         if ( coinPartList )
00512                         {
00513                                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )    coinPartList->removeChild( row - 1 );
00514                                 else coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00515                         }
00516 
00517                 }
00518 
00519         }
00520 
00521     QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00522 
00523         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); ++index )
00524         {
00525             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00526             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00527             instanceParent->children.remove(row);
00528 
00529             QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode->GetNode()];
00530                 instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( instanceNode ) );
00531         }
00532         emit layoutChanged();
00533 }
00534 
00535 void SceneModel::RemoveLightNode( TLightKit& coinLight )
00536 {
00537         SoNodeKitListPart* lightList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "lightList", true ) );
00538     if ( lightList ) lightList->removeChild( &coinLight );
00539     m_instanceRoot->children.remove( 0 );
00540 
00541         SoSearchAction* tracersSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00542         tracersSearch->setType( TTracker::getClassTypeId() );
00543         tracersSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::ALL);
00544         tracersSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00545         SoPathList& trackersPath = tracersSearch->getPaths();
00546 
00547         for( int index = 0; index <trackersPath.getLength(); ++index )
00548         {
00549                 SoFullPath* trackerPath = static_cast< SoFullPath* > ( trackersPath[index] );
00550                 TTracker* tracker = dynamic_cast< TTracker* >( trackerPath->getTail() );
00551                 tracker->Disconnect();
00552         }
00553 
00554         emit LightNodeStateChanged( 0 );
00555     emit layoutChanged();
00556 
00557 }

00559 Qt::ItemFlags SceneModel::flags( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00560 {
00561         Qt::ItemFlags defaultFlags = QAbstractItemModel::flags( modelIndex );
00562 
00563         if ( modelIndex.isValid() )
00564         {
00565                 if ( modelIndex.column() > 0 ) return defaultFlags;
00566                 else return Qt::ItemIsDragEnabled | Qt::ItemIsDropEnabled | Qt::ItemIsEditable | defaultFlags;
00567         }
00568         else return defaultFlags;
00569 }

00571 Qt::DropActions SceneModel::supportedDropActions() const
00572 {
00573         return  Qt::CopyAction | Qt::MoveAction;
00574 }
00575 
00576 Qt::DropActions SceneModel::supportedDragActions() const
00577 {
00578         return Qt::CopyAction | Qt::MoveAction;
00579 }
00585 bool SceneModel::Cut( SoBaseKit& coinParent, int row )
00586 {
00587         if( row < 0 ) return false;
00588 
00589         QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00590         InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00591 
00592         SoNode* coinChild = instanceParent->children[row]->GetNode();
00593         if( !coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00594         {
00595                 SbString partName = coinParent.getPartString( coinChild );
00596                 if( partName.getLength() == 0 ) partName = "material";
00597 
00598                 coinParent.setPart( partName, NULL );
00599         }
00600         else
00601         {
00602                 if( coinParent.getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00603                 {
00604 
00605                         SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", false ) );
00606                         if( !coinPartList ) return false;
00607 
00608 
00609                         if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) )
00610                         {
00611                                 coinChild = coinPartList->getChild( row-1 );
00612                             coinPartList->removeChild( row -1 );
00613                         }
00614                         else
00615                         {
00616                                 coinChild = coinPartList->getChild( row );
00617                             coinPartList->removeChild( row );
00618                         }
00619 
00620                         if( !coinChild ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Cut Null coinChild pointer" );
00621 
00622                 }
00623         }
00624 
00625         QList<InstanceNode*> instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ];
00626 
00627         // Test if the node is shared
00628         if( instanceList.size() == 1 )
00629         {
00630                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceList[0];
00631             DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00632         }
00633         else
00634         {
00635                 QList<InstanceNode*> instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00636                 if( instanceListParent.size() == 1 )
00637                 {
00638                     InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[0];
00639                     InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00640                     DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00641                 }
00642                 else
00643                 {
00644                         for( int index = 0; index< instanceListParent.size(); ++index )
00645                         {
00646                             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00647                             InstanceNode* instanceNode = instanceParent->children[row];
00648                             DeleteInstanceTree( *instanceNode );
00649                         }
00650                 }
00651         }
00652 
00653         emit layoutChanged();
00654 
00655         return true;
00656 }
00657 
00666 QModelIndex SceneModel::IndexFromNodeUrl( QString nodeUrl ) const
00667 {
00668         QStringList nodeList = nodeUrl.split( "/", QString::SkipEmptyParts );
00669 
00670         if( ( nodeList.size() == 1 ) && ( nodeList[0] == "Light" ) )    return index( 0, 0 );
00671 
00672         if( nodeList.size() > 0 )
00673         {
00674                 QString nodeName = nodeList.last();
00675                 nodeList.removeLast();
00676 
00677                 QString parentNodeURL = QString( "//" ) + nodeList.join( "/" );
00678                 QModelIndex parentIndex = IndexFromNodeUrl( parentNodeURL );
00679                 InstanceNode* parentNode = NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00680 
00681                 int child = 0;
00682                 int row = -1;
00683                 while( child < parentNode->children.count() )
00684                 {
00685                         if ( parentNode->children[child]->GetNode()->getName()  == nodeName )
00686                         {
00687                                 row = child;
00688                                 break;
00689                         }
00690                         child++;
00691                 }
00692                 if( row < 0 )   return QModelIndex();
00693                 return index(row, 0, parentIndex );
00694         }
00695         else
00696                 return QModelIndex();
00697 
00698 }
00699 
00708 QModelIndex SceneModel::IndexFromPath( const SoNodeKitPath& coinNodePath ) const
00709 {
00710         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getTail() );
00711         if( !coinNode ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinNode." );
00712 
00713         if( coinNode->getTypeId().getName().getString() == SbName("TLightKit") ) return index( 0, 0 );
00714 
00715         if ( coinNodePath.getLength() > 1 )
00716         {
00717                 SoBaseKit* coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1) );
00718                 if( !coinParent ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinParent." );
00719 
00720                 if( coinParent->getTypeId().getName() == SbName( "TLightKit") ) return index( 0, 0 );
00721 
00722                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent->getPart( "childList", true ) );
00723         if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "IndexFromPath Null coinPartList." );
00724 
00725         int row = coinPartList->findChild(coinNode);
00726         if( coinParent->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00727                 {
00728                 if( coinParent->getPart( "tracker", false ) &&  !coinParent->getPart( "tracker", false )->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSceneTracker::getClassTypeId() ) ) row++;
00729                 }
00730         if( coinNodePath.getNodeFromTail(1)->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoSceneKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00731                 {
00732                 int child = 0;
00733                         while( child < m_instanceRoot->children.count() )
00734                         {
00735                                 if ( m_instanceRoot->children[child]->GetNode() == coinNode )
00736                                         break;
00737                                 child++;
00738                         }
00739                 return index( child, 0 );
00740                 }
00741                 else
00742                 {
00743                         SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinNodePath.copy( 0, 0 ) );
00744                         parentPath->truncate( parentPath->getLength() - 1 );
00745                                                 QModelIndex parentIndex = IndexFromPath( *parentPath );
00746                         QModelIndex childIndex =  index (row, 0, parentIndex );
00747                 return childIndex;
00748                 }
00749 
00750         }
00751         else
00752                 return QModelIndex();
00753 
00754 }
00755 
00760 bool SceneModel::Paste( tgc::PasteType type, SoBaseKit& coinParent, SoNode& coinNode, int row )
00761 {
00762         SoNode* coinChild = 0;
00763         SoNode* pCoinParent = 0;
00764         pCoinParent = &coinParent;
00765 
00766         if ( type == tgc::Shared ) coinChild = &coinNode;
00767 
00768 
00769         switch ( type )
00770         {
00771                 case tgc::Copied :
00772                         coinChild = static_cast< SoNode* >( coinNode.copy( true ) );
00773                         break;
00774 
00775                 case tgc::Shared :
00776                 default :
00777                         coinChild = &coinNode;
00778                     break;
00779         }
00780         if( !coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00781         {
00782                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TTracker::getClassTypeId() ) )
00783                 {
00784                         TSeparatorKit* separatorKit = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( pCoinParent );
00785                         TTracker* tracker = static_cast< TTracker* >( separatorKit->getPart( "tracker", false ) );
00786                         if (tracker)
00787                         {
00788                                 QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TSeparatorKit already contains a tracker" ) );
00789                                 return false;
00790                         }
00791                         coinParent.setPart( "tracker", coinChild );
00792 
00793                 }
00794 
00795                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoShape::getClassTypeId() ) )
00796                 {
00797                         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( pCoinParent );
00798                         if(!shapeKit)   return false;
00799                         TShape* shape = static_cast< TShape* >( shapeKit->getPart( "shape", false ) );
00800 
00801                 if (shape)
00802                 {
00803                         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TShapeKit already contains a shape" ) );
00804                         return false;
00805                 }
00806                         coinParent.setPart("shape", coinChild );
00807                 }
00808                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoMaterial::getClassTypeId() ) )
00809                 {
00810                         TShapeKit* shapeKit = static_cast< TShapeKit* >( pCoinParent );
00811                         if(!shapeKit)   return false;
00812                         TMaterial* material = static_cast< TMaterial* >( shapeKit->getPart( "material", false ) );
00813                         if (material)
00814                 {
00815                         QMessageBox::warning( 0, tr( "Tonatiuh warning" ), tr( "This TShapeKit already contains a material" ) );
00816                         return false;
00817                 }
00818                         coinParent.setPart("material", coinChild );
00819                 }
00820 
00821         }
00822         else
00823         {
00824                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = static_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( coinParent.getPart( "childList", true ) );
00825                 if( !coinPartList ) tgf::SevereError( "SceneModel::Paste Null coinPartList pointer" );
00826                 if( coinParent.getPart( "tracker", false ) ) coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row -1 );
00827                 else coinPartList->insertChild( coinChild, row );
00828         }
00829 
00830         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceListParent = m_mapCoinQt[ &coinParent ];
00831         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceListParent.count(); ++index )
00832         {
00833             InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceListParent[index];
00834                 InstanceNode* instanceChild = new InstanceNode( coinChild );
00835                 instanceParent->InsertChild( row, instanceChild );
00836 
00837                 //Inserting InstanceNode in the map
00838                 QList< InstanceNode* > instanceNodeList;
00839                 m_mapCoinQt.insert( std::make_pair( coinChild, instanceNodeList ) );
00840         m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ].append( instanceChild );
00841                 GenerateInstanceTree( *instanceChild );
00842         }
00843 
00844         emit layoutChanged();
00845         return true;
00846 }
00847 
00848 
00849 bool SceneModel::SetNodeName( SoNode* coinChild, QString newName )
00850 {
00851         QList< InstanceNode* > nodeInstances = m_mapCoinQt[ coinChild ];
00852         if( nodeInstances.size() == 0 ) return false;
00853 
00854         QList< InstanceNode* > instancesParent;
00855         for( int index = 0; index < nodeInstances.size(); ++index )
00856         {
00857 
00858                 InstanceNode* instance = nodeInstances[index];
00859                 QVector< InstanceNode* > parentChildren = instance->GetParent()->children;
00860                 int childIndex = parentChildren.indexOf( instance );
00861                 for( int child = 0; child < parentChildren.size(); ++child )
00862                 {
00863 
00864                         SbName idChildName = parentChildren[child]->GetNode()->getName();
00865                         if( child!= childIndex && idChildName == newName.toStdString().c_str() )        return false;
00866                 }
00867         }
00868         coinChild->setName( newName.toStdString().c_str() );
00869 
00870 
00871         emit layoutChanged();
00872         return true;
00873 
00874 }

00876 
00877 void SceneModel::UpdateSceneModel()
00878 {
00879 
00880         TLightKit* lightKit = static_cast< TLightKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "lightList[0]", false ) );
00881         if ( !lightKit )        return;
00882 
00883         TSeparatorKit* concentratorRoot = static_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( m_coinScene->getPart( "childList[0]", true ) );
00884         if ( !concentratorRoot )        return;
00885 
00886         SoGetBoundingBoxAction* bbAction = new SoGetBoundingBoxAction( SbViewportRegion() ) ;
00887         concentratorRoot->getBoundingBox( bbAction );
00888 
00889         SbBox3f box = bbAction->getXfBoundingBox().project();
00890         delete bbAction;
00891 
00892         BBox sceneBox;
00893         if( !box.isEmpty() )
00894         {
00895                 sceneBox.pMin = Point3D( box.getMin()[0], box.getMin()[1], box.getMin()[2] );
00896                 sceneBox.pMax = Point3D( box.getMax()[0], box.getMax()[1], box.getMax()[2] );
00897         }
00898 
00899         if( lightKit ) lightKit->Update( sceneBox );
00900 
00901 
00902         emit layoutChanged();
00903 
00904 }
00905 
00906 void SceneModel::DeleteInstanceTree( InstanceNode& instanceNode )
00907 {
00908         if( instanceNode.GetNode()->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00909         {
00910                 TSeparatorKit* separatorNode = static_cast<TSeparatorKit*>( instanceNode.GetNode() );
00911                 SoNode* tracker = separatorNode->getPart( "tracker", false );
00912                 if( tracker )
00913                 {
00914                         TTracker* trackerNode = static_cast< TTracker* >( tracker );
00915                         trackerNode->SetSceneKit( 0 );
00916                 }
00917         }
00918 
00919         for ( int index = 0; index < instanceNode.children.count(); ++index)
00920         {
00921                 InstanceNode* childInstance = instanceNode.children[index];
00922                 DeleteInstanceTree( *childInstance );
00923                 delete childInstance;
00924         }
00925 
00926         QList<InstanceNode*>& instanceList = m_mapCoinQt[ instanceNode.GetNode()];
00927         instanceList.removeAt( instanceList.indexOf( &instanceNode ) );
00928 
00929         InstanceNode* instanceParent = instanceNode.GetParent();
00930         if( instanceParent )
00931         {
00932                 int row = instanceParent->children.indexOf( &instanceNode );
00933 
00934                 instanceParent->children.remove( row );
00935 
00936         }
00937 }
00938 
00939 SoNodeKitPath* SceneModel::PathFromIndex( const QModelIndex& modelIndex ) const
00940 {
00941         SoNode* coinNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex )->GetNode();
00942         if (!coinNode->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( SoBaseKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00943         {
00944 
00945         QModelIndex parentIndex = parent( modelIndex );
00946                 SoNodeKitPath* parentPath = PathFromIndex( parentIndex );
00947                 return parentPath;
00948 
00949         }
00950         else
00951         {
00952                 SoSearchAction* coinSearch = new SoSearchAction();
00953                 coinSearch->setNode( m_coinScene );
00954                 coinSearch->setInterest( SoSearchAction::FIRST);
00955                 coinSearch->apply( m_coinRoot );
00956 
00957                 SoPath* coinScenePath = coinSearch->getPath( );
00958                 if( !coinScenePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null coinScenePath." );
00959 
00960                 SoNodeKitPath* nodePath = static_cast< SoNodeKitPath* > ( coinScenePath );
00961                 if( !nodePath ) tgf::SevereError( "PathFromIndex Null nodePath." );
00962 
00963                 nodePath->ref();
00964                 delete coinSearch;
00965 
00966                 InstanceNode* instanceNode = NodeFromIndex( modelIndex );
00967 
00968                 SoNodeList nodeList;
00969                 while(instanceNode->GetParent() )
00970                 {
00971                         nodeList.append( instanceNode->GetNode() );
00972                         instanceNode = instanceNode->GetParent();
00973                 }
00974 
00975                 for( int i = nodeList.getLength(); i > 0; --i )
00976                 {
00977                         SoBaseKit* coinNode = static_cast< SoBaseKit* >( nodeList[i-1] );
00978                         if ( coinNode ) nodePath->append( coinNode );
00979 
00980                 }
00981                 return nodePath;
00982         }
00983 }
